bibdata.title: American National Standard for Metric Practice
American National Standard for Metric Practice
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE/ ASTM SI 10-2010 (Revision of IEEE/ASTM SI 10-2002)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Guidance for the use of the modern metric system is given. Known as the International System of Units (abbreviated SI), the system is the basis for worldwide standardization of measurement units. Information is included on SI, a list of units recognized for use with SI, and a list of conversion factors, together with general guidance on proper style and usage.
conversion factors, International System, International System of Units, metric practice, metric system, rounding, SI, SI 10, Systeme International d'Unites

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
